title: GeographicAddress
description: Structured textual way of describing how to find a Property in an urban area (country properties are often defined differently).
$comment: If this entity is used as a filter, it will match all other geographic addresses with the same properties. If the geographicLocation is used, it must match inside the geo-fence.

country.description: Country that the address is in.

stateOrProvince.description: The State or Province that the address is in.

city.description: City that the address is in.

postcode.description: Descriptor for a postal delivery area, used to speed and simplify the delivery of mail (also know as zipcode).

streetNr.description: Number identifying a specific property on a public street.
